Skip to main content

An official website of the United States government

The .gov means it’s official.
Federal government websites often end in .gov or .mil. Before sharing sensitive information, make sure you’re on a federal government site.

The site is secure.
The https:// ensures that you are connecting to the official website and that any information you provide is encrypted and transmitted securely.

Collection

A collection displays a compact list of multiple related items like articles or events. The list links each item to its original source.

Default

  • Gears of Government President’s Award winners

    Today, the Administration announces the winners of the Gears of Government President’s Award. This program recognizes the contributions of individuals and teams across the federal workforce who make a profound difference in the lives of the American people.

    • By Sondra Ainsworth and Constance Lu
    • September 30, 2020
    • New
    • PMA
    • OMB

  • Women-owned small business dashboard

    In honor of National Women’s Small Business Month, we’ve partnered with SBA’s Office of Government Contracting and Business Development and Office of Program Performance, Analysis, and Evaluation to highlight the Women-Owned Small Businesses (WOSBs) data dashboard!

    • By Constance Lu
    • September 30, 2020
    • SBA
Example HTML usage: 
<!-- Default collection -->
<ul class="collection">
  <li class="collection-item">
    <div class="collection-body">
      <h3 class="collection-heading">
        <a href="https://www.performance.gov/presidents-winners-press-release/"
          >Gears of Government President’s Award winners</a
        >
      </h3>
      <p class="collection-description">
        Today, the Administration announces the winners of the Gears of
        Government President’s Award. This program recognizes the contributions
        of individuals and teams across the federal workforce who make a
        profound difference in the lives of the American people.
      </p>
      <ul class="collection-meta" aria-label="More information">
        <li class="collection-meta-item">
          By Sondra Ainsworth and Constance Lu
        </li>
        <li class="collection-meta-item">
          <time datetime="2020-09-30T12:00:00+01:00"> September 30, 2020 </time>
        </li>
      </ul>

      <ul class="collection-meta" aria-label="Topics">
        <li class="collection-meta-item tag tag-new">New</li>
        <li class="collection-meta-item tag">PMA</li>
        <li class="collection-meta-item tag">OMB</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </li>
  <li class="collection-item">
    <div class="collection-body">
      <h3 class="collection-heading">
        <a href="https://www.performance.gov/sba-wosb-dashboard/"
          >Women-owned small business dashboard</a
        >
      </h3>
      <p class="collection-description">
        In honor of National Women’s Small Business Month, we’ve partnered with
        SBA’s Office of Government Contracting and Business Development and
        Office of Program Performance, Analysis, and Evaluation to highlight the
        Women-Owned Small Businesses (WOSBs) data dashboard!
      </p>
      <ul class="collection-meta" aria-label="More information">
        <li class="collection-meta-item">By Constance Lu</li>
        <li class="collection-meta-item">
          <time datetime="2020-09-30T12:00:00+01:00"> September 30, 2020 </time>
        </li>
      </ul>

      <ul class="collection-meta" aria-label="Topics">
        <li class="collection-meta-item tag">SBA</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </li>
</ul>

Example HTML usage: 
<!-- Media thumbnail collection -->
<ul class="collection">
  <li class="collection-item">
    <img
      class="collection-img"
      src="https://www.performance.gov/img/GoG/gears-govt-presidents.png"
      alt="Gears of Government Awards - President's Award"
    />

Calendar display

  • SEP 30

    Gears of Government President’s Award winners

    Today, the Administration announces the winners of the Gears of Government President’s Award. This program recognizes the contributions of individuals and teams across the federal workforce who make a profound difference in the lives of the American people.

  • OCT 15

    Women-owned small business dashboard

    In honor of National Women’s Small Business Month, we’ve partnered with SBA’s Office of Government Contracting and Business Development and Office of Program Performance, Analysis, and Evaluation to highlight the Women-Owned Small Businesses (WOSBs) data dashboard!

Example HTML usage: 
<!-- Calendar display collection -->
<ul class="collection">
  <li class="collection-item">
    <div
      class="collection-calendar-date"
      href="https://www.performance.gov/presidents-winners-press-release/"
    >
      <time datetime="2020-09-30T12:00:00+01:00">
        <span class="collection-calendar-date-month">SEP</span>
        <span class="collection-calendar-date-day">30</span>
      </time>
    </div>
    <div class="collection-body">
      <h3 class="collection-heading">
        <a href="https://www.performance.gov/presidents-winners-press-release/"
          >Gears of Government President’s Award winners</a
        >
      </h3>
      <p class="collection-description">
        Today, the Administration announces the winners of the Gears of
        Government President’s Award. This program recognizes the contributions
        of individuals and teams across the federal workforce who make a
        profound difference in the lives of the American people.
      </p>
    </div>
  </li>
  <li class="collection-item">
    <div
      class="collection-calendar-date"
      href="https://www.performance.gov/sba-wosb-dashboard/"
    >
      <time datetime="2020-10-15T12:00:00+01:00">
        <span class="collection-calendar-date-month">OCT</span>
        <span class="collection-calendar-date-day">15</span>
      </time>
    </div>
    <div class="collection-body">
      <h3 class="collection-heading">
        <a href="https://www.performance.gov/sba-wosb-dashboard/"
          >Women-owned small business dashboard</a
        >
      </h3>
      <p class="collection-description">
        In honor of National Women’s Small Business Month, we’ve partnered with
        SBA’s Office of Government Contracting and Business Development and
        Office of Program Performance, Analysis, and Evaluation to highlight the
        Women-Owned Small Businesses (WOSBs) data dashboard!
      </p>
    </div>
  </li>
</ul>

    • public Digital.gov

    • public U.S. Web Design System

  • Progress on Cross-Agency Priority (CAP) goals and Agency Priority Goals (APGs)

Example HTML usage: 
<!-- Headings only collection -->
<ul class="collection collection--condensed">
  <li class="collection-item">
    <div class="collection-body">
      <h3 class="collection-heading">
        <a href="https://digital.gov/guides/mobile-principles/?dg"
          >The eight principles of mobile-friendliness</a
        >
      </h3>
      <ul class="collection-meta" aria-label="More information">
        <li class="collection-meta-item position-relative">

          Digital.gov
        </li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </li>
